title: Is Sacha Baron Cohen a white Englishman or an Arab? - Quora

response.answer_text: he is an Anglo-saxon. I can imagine the IQ of people in the west while looking at his movies. In the film borat he depicted kazakhs as Eruopean looking people People in kazakhstan actually look like this  Sacha (the lunatic) represented them as European looking people  This is the thing that pissed off kazakhs very much! Kazakhstan is a very rich country  Borat was shot in the poor european country of Romania

“Sacha Baron Cohen's father's family are Eastern European Jews who moved to Pontypridd, Wales and London, England, and his mother's family are German Jews.[9] His paternal grandfather, Morris Cohen, added "Baron" to his surname. “[1] So, he is not an Arab….he was born in England and his family is from Europe.
